translations.text: Woe to every fault-finding backbiter;<sup foot_note="182835">1</sup>
who amasses wealth and counts it over and again.<sup foot_note="182836">1</sup>
He thinks that his wealth will immortalise him forever.<sup foot_note="182837">1</sup>
Nay, he shall be thrown<sup foot_note="182838">1</sup> into the Crusher.<sup foot_note="182839">2</sup>
And what do you know what the Crusher is?
It is the Fire<sup foot_note="182840">1</sup> kindled by Allah,
the Fire that shall rise to the hearts (of criminals).<sup foot_note="182841">1</sup>
Verily it will close in upon them,<sup foot_note="182842">1</sup>
